rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Prince Adel and Prince Hugo, as
you stand together before me, I am
reminded of the good old days...

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Do you remember that night an Aspar
got into Hugo's bedroom and Adel
disposed of it in one easy swing?

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0003
rows.name:
You were too young to be told of this
at the time, but the Aspar's fangs had
been doused with a deadly poison.

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0004
rows.name:
It is fortunate that you were not hurt.
But even now, it chills me to wonder
who could have set that beast on you.

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Ever since that night, you two have
been fast friends. And look at you
today, hand in hand once again!

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, my heart swells to see you thus. As
long as you harbor such courage and
affection, Alst's future will be bright!

rows.label: tlk70000027_04_msg0008
rows.name:
I suppose I am. But you must allow me
a little fond reminiscing now and
again...
